H0.text: Oxygen is released by trees, which is why wood is considered a renewable resource.

H1.text: Trees can be replanted, which is why wood is considered a renewable resource.

H2.text: There are many varieties of trees, which is why wood is considered a renewable resource.

H3.text: Trees are used for many purposes, which is why wood is considered a renewable resource.

A4.text: An important renewable resource is wood provided by means of forestry, which has been used for construction, housing and firewood since ancient times.

A5.text: Wood remains the largest biomass energy source today.
